contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 10, 1857 D Scarborough Contest - 2nd Class
Scarborough Contest (2nd Class) 20 Test Piece Contest Scarborough Contest scarborough-contest-2nd-class
Castle Yard, Scarborough The first prize of the second class was £7. to be awarded to the best brass band in this class, £5 for the second bests and £3 for the third best. No band allowed to enter this class that had previously won a prize of £10, or any sum above.
Jan. 24, 2012, 2:23 p.m. Jan. 24, 2012, 2:28 p.m.
1 Leeds Joppa Operatic Richard Smith
2 Horsforth Subscription Unknown
3 Whitby Volunteer W. Mercer
